mapper.select: SELECT o.id, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity), 0) AS totalQuantity, COALESCE(SUM(oi.price * oi.quantity), 0) AS totalPrice, o.status, o.order_date FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN OrderItems oi ON oi.order_id = o.id GROUP BY o.id, o.status ORDER BY o.id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
